text: Vladimir Smirnov (born 11 June 1947) is a Soviet ski jumper. He competed in the normal hill and large hill events at the 1968 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1947 births Category:Living people Category:Soviet male ski jumpers Category:Olympic ski jumpers of the Soviet Union Category:Ski jumpers at the 1968 Winter Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Moscow
title: Vladimir Smirnov (ski jumper)
